医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Revvity 在 SLAS2025 上引发科学突破Revvity, Inc. 将于 1 月 27 日至 29 日在圣地亚哥举行的 SLAS2025 上推出其突破性的全新 Phenologic.AI™ 软件。 Phenologic.AI 软件旨在重新定义 Revvity Harmony™ 和 Signals Image Artist™ 软件包的细胞成像工作流程，利用预先训练的深度学习模型来分析明场图像，为活细胞分析提供额外的多重通道和简化的工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Revity-ignites-scientific-breakthroughs-at-SLAS2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Revity-ignites-scientific-breakthroughs-at-SLAS2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3c061af-0a00-4ff2-8ba4-30d19c88d46c Fri, 24 Jan 2025 04:00:00 -0500 Revvity ignites scientific breakthroughs at SLAS2025
全球肠道观察：科学家强调微生物组多样性研究人员分析了 168,464 个样本，以揭示地理和技术因素如何影响全球肠道微生物组变化，强调代表性不足的地区和技术偏差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/A-global-look-at-the-gut-Scientists-highlight-microbiome-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/A-global-look-at-the-gut-Scientists-highlight-microbiome-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da942bd7-9210-4c56-8dab-9de7745b1598 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 22:35:00 -0500 A global look at the gut: Scientists highlight microbiome diversity
研究表明体力活动如何增强大脑功能并预防痴呆症罗格斯大学新不伦瑞克分校科学家领导的一项研究表明，运动后大脑中参与身体对胰岛素反应的特殊细胞被激活，这表明体力活动可能会直接改善大脑功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-shows-how-physical-activity-can-enhance-brain-function-and-prevent-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-shows-how-physical-activity-can-enhance-brain-function-and-prevent-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18ad450a-1850-487a-98c7-9cce1cf83a76 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 22:00:00 -0500 Study shows how physical activity can enhance brain function and prevent dementia
利用游戏玩家的力量来解开癌症之谜癌症是恶性的。到 2025 年，预计美国将有超过 618,000 人死亡，几乎是默塞德和莫德斯托人口总和的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Harnessing-the-power-of-gamers-to-solve-cancers-mysteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Harnessing-the-power-of-gamers-to-solve-cancers-mysteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e858b8-2808-44e1-ac96-058bf5be966e Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:58:00 -0500 Harnessing the power of gamers to solve cancer's mysteries
新的机器学习方法改进了单细胞数据分析我们的身体由大约 750 亿个细胞组成。但是每个细胞执行什么功能以及健康人的细胞与患病者的细胞有多大差异？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-machine-learning-approach-improves-single-cell-data-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-machine-learning-approach-improves-single-cell-data-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7913f13d-8dd2-42c9-a100-c920fc5381e4 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:53:56 -0500 New machine learning approach improves single-cell data analysis
新化合物 V-161 为对抗抗生素耐药细菌带来希望V-161 是一种针对耐万古霉素屎肠球菌 (VRE) 中 Na+ -V-ATP 酶的新型化合物，可显着减少细菌生长和定植。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-compound-V-161-offers-Hope-in​​-the-fight-against-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-compound-V-161-offers-Hope-in​​-the-fight-against-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cc6f7bd-92e0-487c-9ce3-0e0f843f310d Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:40:00 -0500 New compound V-161 offers hope in the fight against antibiotic-resistant bacteria
研究表明，均衡饮食中的瘦红肉有助于肠道和心脏健康普渡大学科学家最近的一项研究表明，坚持以瘦红肉为特色的饮食模式有助于肠道微生物群平衡并支持心血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Lean-red-meat-in-balanced-diet-supports-gut-and-heart-health-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Lean-red-meat-in-balanced-diet-supports-gut-and-heart-health-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29ab874d-8cc7-457c-ac03-e8c5474feacd Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:28:00 -0500 Lean red meat in balanced diet supports gut and heart health, study reveals
多组学方法确定治疗 AML 的潜在药物组合急性髓系白血病（AML）主要特点是骨髓中髓系细胞数量增多，成熟细胞减少，占白血病病例的28%，五年生存率仅为30.5%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Multi-omics-approach-identizes-potial-drug-combinations-for-AML-treatment-In-A-Paper-Pub.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Multi-omics-approach-identizes-potential-drug-combinations-for-AML-treatment-In-A-Paper-Pub.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f66d08-c61b-4c1e-ad6f-f0c44d0e0186 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:22:00 -0500 Multi-omics approach identifies potential drug combinations for AML treatment
新发现揭示了细菌如何利用质粒来建立抵抗力一项国际合作在理解细菌产生耐药性的遗传机制方面取得了重要突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-how-bacteria-use-plasmids-to-build-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-how-bacteria-use-plasmids-to-build-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bdbcf93-ff90-46f2-9133-6be13aa5390b Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:13:02 -0500 New discovery sheds light on how bacteria use plasmids to build resistance
研究人员发现铁死亡是黑色素瘤转移中骨细胞死亡的驱动因素黑色素瘤是最具侵袭性的皮肤癌之一，通常会转移到骨骼，导致严重的骨质流失、骨折风险增加和严重疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Researchers-identify-ferroptosis-as-driver-of-ostetherapy-death-in-melanoma-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Researchers-identify-ferroptosis-as-driver-of-ostetherapy-death-in-melanoma-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a25f02e0-089b-46b0-9b53-3399323951fb Thu, 23 Jan 2025 21:10:07 -0500 Researchers identify ferroptosis as driver of osteocyte death in melanoma metastasis
